definition: right/correct/couple/pair/towards/at/for/to face/opposite/to treat (sb a certain way)/to match together/to adjust/to fit/to suit/to answer/to reply/classifier: couple
dialect/language/spoken words/speech/talk/words/conversation/what sb said/CL:種|种[zhong3],席[xi2],句[ju4],口[kou3],番[fan1]

sentences.english: Further Practice for Pairs ·Add a third speaker and create your own lines.
sentences.chinese: 加进圈外人，创作你们自己的对话。

sentences.english: LCD screen display, man-machine dialogue, graphic display interface.
sentences.chinese: 液晶屏幕显示，人机对话，图形显示界面。

sentences.english: Use the concept map to promote dialogue and cooperation.
sentences.chinese: 运用概念图，促进对话与合作。

sentences.english: 'The longer you've known someone, the easier that conversation is, ' Dr. Epperly adds.
sentences.chinese: 艾伯利医生说，你认识病患越久，这种对话就越容易。

sentences.english: Right-click the project, and launch the properties dialog.
sentences.chinese: 右键单击工程，启动属性对话框。

sentences.english: How ungrateful then that, as the talks limp towards collapse, accusing fingers are being pointed at America.
sentences.chinese: 随着对话走向破裂，大家非常不领情面得指责美国。

sentences.english: Dear Colleagues, It gives me great pleasure to co-chair the third round of the China-US Economic Dialogue together with Secretary Geithner.
sentences.chinese: 我很高兴与盖特纳财长共同主持第三轮中美经济对话。

sentences.english: Then work in pairs, make & act out one.
A year after that conversation, Sabine left the relationship.
sentences.chinese: 在那次对话一年之后，Sabine离开了。

sentences.english: We go on and on conversing in our own minds aka thinking.
sentences.chinese: 我们和自己对话的方式就是思考。

sentences.english: The exchange of words between the man and woman shows a lot about them.
sentences.chinese: 这位女士和这位男士间的对话表露出许多信息。

sentences.english: It was, instead, an example of Chinese stagecraft.
sentences.chinese: 这次对话是中国式做戏的一个典范。

sentences.english: By definition, a conversation is bi-directional communication.
sentences.chinese: 顾名思义，“对话”就是一个双向的沟通过程。

sentences.english: Multi-actor dialog timeline for actor conversations.
sentences.chinese: 多演员的演员交谈对话的时间表。

sentences.english: Typically, that involves retrying for a certain amount of time and then displaying a dialog.
sentences.chinese: 通常，这涉及重试一段时间然后显示对话框。

definition: to talk with sb (face to face)/discussion/talk/chat
to talk (with sb)/to have a conversation/talk/conversation/CL:次[ci4]
a speech/to speak/to talk/to address/CL:個|个[ge4]
conflict/to conflict/clash of opposing forces/collision (of interests)/contention
to hold a conversation/to talk over the telephone/phone call
